thread.title: December 2016 stay with 11 month old
thread.title_full: December 2016 stay with 11 month old - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, World Trade Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LoVeHoLiDaYs030
title: December 2016 stay with 11 month old
text: Excellent hotel. We had a big room with sofa bed, double bed and kitchen. Good for storing child's food etc. Stayed Fri-Sunday then 2 nights near Times square. Hotel was in great location to everything. Ate in restaurant for breakfast, was lovely - waffles are amazing and views were lovely. Highly recommend.
